71187 - Car Fire

Telford

Details:
False alarm raised with good intent by a passer by mistaking mechanical engine failure for a fire.

Ludlow

Details:
Chimney fire within flue liner due to a large birds nest.
71172 - Bin Fire
Market Street Wellington
Telford
Fri, 01/03/2019 - 23:33
Details:
Fire involving one bin. Fire out on arrival. Nothing in use by fire service.

News

Shropshire and Wrekin Fire Authority Budget Consultation 2019/20
Tue, 29/01/2019 - 16:14
How do we pay for your service? We receive around 27% of our budget from government grant and business rates, with the balance coming from council tax. Government grants have been decreasing since...
Read More about "Shropshire and Wrekin Fire Authority Budget Consultation 2019/20"
Fire Service Backs Electrical Safety Campaign
Thu, 15/11/2018 - 12:05
Shropshire Fire and Rescue Service is urging people to check on their older neighbours and family members this winter as part of a campaign to reduce the number of electrical fires involving elderly...
Read More about "Fire Service Backs Electrical Safety Campaign"
Register Your Electrical Appliances Say Fire Safety Experts
Mon, 12/11/2018 - 09:40
Householders are being strongly urged to register electrical appliances by fire safety experts. Shropshire Fire and Rescue Service says people who register new and old appliances with the relevant...
Read More about "Register Your Electrical Appliances Say Fire Safety Experts"
Fire Service Wants the Public to Share its First Ever Christmas Ball
Fri, 09/11/2018 - 14:24
Shropshire firefighters have issued an invitation to members of the public to join them at the fire service’s first ever Christmas Ball next month (Dec). “We have never held a Christmas Ball before...
Read More about "Fire Service Wants the Public to Share its First Ever Christmas Ball"
Choose an Organised Bonfire Event Says Fire Service
Wed, 31/10/2018 - 10:15
Fire service experts are urging people to attend organised bonfire night events rather than hold their own in their garden or on waste ground. The advice comes ahead of what is expected to be a busy...
Read More about "Choose an Organised Bonfire Event Says Fire Service"
